text: It took 4 days for a @fairfaxcounty VA school system to contact a family whose child was exposed to #COVID19 by the teacher’s assistant. Now they are all quarantined. 4 days w/o notice. What happens if someone in the family dies? #Criminal @CDCDirector #vaccine #VaccinateTeachers https://t.co/QzHpAjgGzZ
